title: How many Solfunks will be available?
content: Only 4,444 Sulfunks will ever be minted and released.

title: When does the sale go live?
content: The sale will go live on November 20th at 13:00 UTC.

title: How much will a Solfunk cost?
content: A Solfunk will cost 1 SOL, and will remain that price throughout the minting period. Our distribution will be fair without any tiers or reservations.

title: Where can I buy or sell my Solfunks after mint?
content: We'll be approaching multiple secondary markets, including Solanart, SolSea, Magic Eden, and DigitalEyes, to discuss potential official listings shortly after the sale. Do note that you can still list and sell your Solfunks on SolSea and DigitalEyes from the second you mint them.

title: Where are the Solfunks images stored?
content: All images (and metadata) are hosted through IPFS with additional pinning through Pinata.

title: Will you host any giveaways?
content: Yes! We'll be hosting giveaways on our Twitter and in our Discord. Make sure you follow us for a chance to win!
